dict.string: This is a middleware SDK. Licensing is handled via Stripe B2B portal at https://buy.stripe.com/8wMaGE3kV0f61jW6oo. No in-app purchases or Apple Pay subscriptions are used. This app demonstrates SDK capabilities for enterprise evaluation.
AVRT SDK provides voice-first ethical AI middleware with SPIEL framework validation and THT protocol compliance.

AVRT (Advanced Voice Reasoning Technology) is a middleware SDK that acts as an ethical firewall between human voice input and AI language models.
KEY FEATURES: - SPIEL Framework: Safety, Personalization, Integrity, Ethics, Logic scoring - THT Protocol: Truth, Honesty, Transparency validation - EaaS: Ethics-as-a-Service rule engine - LARM: Encrypted audit logging with SHA-256 hash chains - Voice-first input processing - Fail-closed security defaults
This demo app showcases SDK capabilities for enterprise B2B evaluation. Production licensing available via Stripe portal.
Patent: USPTO 19/236,935 (c) 2025 BGBH Threads LLC

This is a PRIVATE ENTERPRISE EVALUATION build for the AVRT middleware SDK.
PURPOSE: Demonstrate SDK capabilities to potential B2B licensees.
MONETIZATION: All licensing is handled externally via Stripe B2B portal. No Apple Pay, no in-app purchases, no subscriptions within the app.
DEMO ACCOUNT: Available upon request for review purposes.
The app requires microphone access for voice input demonstration. All voice processing occurs on-device; no audio is transmitted externally.
Patent: USPTO 19/236,935 Trademarks: AVRT, SPIEL, THT, EaaS, LARM
Contact: jason.proper29@gmail.com
Uses standard iOS encryption APIs (CryptoKit) for local audit log encryption only. No proprietary encryption algorithms. Qualifies for ECCN 5D002 exemption.
AVRT SDK demonstration app for enterprise B2B evaluation. Test voice input, SPIEL scoring, and ethical AI validation features.

1. Voice input capture and transcription 2. SPIEL score display (Safety, Personalization, Integrity, Ethics, Logic) 3. THT protocol validation indicators 4. Audit log export functionality 5. Dashboard analytics view
